front.title: A Yang Data Model for IETF Network Slice NBI

abstract.t: This document provides a YANG data model for the IETF Network Slice NBI (Northbound Interface). The model can be used by a higher level system to request configuration, and management IETF Network Slices from the IETF Network Slice Controller (NSC).
The YANG modules in this document conforms to the Network Management Datastore Architecture (NMDA) defined in RFC 8342.
